TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DoneHandler(object o, DoneArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DoneHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DoneHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DoneHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DoneHandler is removed from the event.
